Asmeret Ghebremicael
====================

[Township Council](https://www.westorange.org/Directory.aspx?DID=38)  
Title: Township Council  
Phone: [(973) 325-4155](tel:9733254155)
  
[Township Council](https://www.westorange.org/98/Township-Council-Videos)
  
[Email Councilwoman Ghebremicael](mailto:aghebremicael@westorange.org)

### Contact Us

1. **West Orange Town Hall**  
   66 Main Street  
   West Orange, NJ 07052  
   Phone: [973-325-4100](tel:973-325-4100)  
   [Contact Us](https://www.westorange.org/directory.aspx)

1. **Town Hall Hours**  
   Monday - Friday  
   8:30am - 4:30pm  
   Closed On Federal Holidays
